Title: The Brand New Testament
Actors: Pili Groyne, Benoît Poelvoorde, Catherine Deneuve, François Damiens
Plot: Did you know that God is alive and lives in Brussels with his daughter?
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 24 nominations.
Production: Orange Studio, Orange Cinéma Séries, Après le Déluge, VOO, RTBF, Climax Films, BeTV, Terra Incognita Films, Juliette Films, BNP Paribas Fortis Film Fund, Caviar Films
